categories: Category:Imperial Navy officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Lilit Arranda was a female Human, who lived during the time of the Galactic Civil War.

Lilit Arranda was a native of the planet Alderaan and following the death of her husband, she enlisted in the Imperial Navy. She underwent training as a medic and was eventually assigned to serve aboard the Executor-class Star Dreadnought Executor. Shortly after the Battle of Hoth in 3 ABY, Arranda was part of a group of Executor crewmembers who were tasked with solving the murder of Lieutenant Tanith Sorn.
